SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
! Validating Input :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_YAML_FILE_PATH# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_YAML_CONTENT# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &COUNT# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Please provide either YAML file path or content." :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ Building java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RemoveYAMLAction"
! Build java arguments : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_YAML_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! yaml content : IF &UC4RB_YAML_FILE_PATH# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_YAML_FILE_PATH# : ELSE : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_YAML_TO_FILE : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#, " -yamlfilepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! path to yaml element : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_YAML_ELEMENT_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#, " -elementpath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Action fail or not : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#, " -fail &UC4RB_YAML_FAIL#")
! Modified download file path : IF &UC4RB_YAML_DOWNLOAD_PATH# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_YAML_DOWNLOAD_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# , " -downloadpath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_YAML_CMD#
&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** REMOVE YAML CONTENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** REMOVE YAML CONTENT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
